mil7.2.10:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘makkatassa dve angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani dve angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.2.10:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, makkato vasamupagacchanto tatharupe okase mahatimaharukkhe pavivitte sabbatthakasakhe bhiruttane vasamupagacchati;
mil7.2.10:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena lajjim pesalam silavantam kalyanadhammam bahussutam dhammadharam vinayadharam piyam garubhavaniyam vattaram vacanakkhamam ovadakam vinnapakam sandassakam samadapakam samuttejakam sampahamsakam evarupam kalyanamittam acariyam nissaya viharitabbam.
mil7.2.10:1.4: Idam, maharaja, makkatassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.2.10:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, makkato rukkheyeva carati titthati nisidati, yadi niddam okkamati, tattheva rattim vasamanubhavati;
mil7.2.10:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena pavanabhimukhena bhavitabbam, pavaneyeva thanacankamanisajjasayanam niddam okkamitabbam, tattheva satipatthanamanubhavitabbam.
mil7.2.10:2.3: Idam, maharaja, makkatassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
